name: Spacelair
description: Spacelair is a retro sidescroller arcade adventure with various gameplay challenges; health, air, food, work, education, energy, purchase buildings, mini-missions, greenhouses and without violence or shooting. Dive into the parallax future and discover your lair today!!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 68 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: 2.1GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB
